--- Lokk / Axis ---

Lokk nods to Grounded, reaching the place directly behind the 
enemy, and understanding the codeded message. He waves his 
hand indicating that he is going to attack in three. He counts down, 
and pulls guns out, aiming them at the bots, then stops. He 
doesn't want anybody to get caught in the crossfire. Knowing that 
he is not visible to the enemy, he starts to crawl to the nearst 
mountain, which was right beside him. He gets behind it, gets up 
and runs up the mountain, opening a commlink to Grounded, 
"Trying to get higher so there is no crossfire." He keeps going.

Axis still wondering where Lokk was, pulls his gun over the podd, 
and fires two laser blasts at Barrymore, and the pulls back behind 
the pod, his laser charging again. 


On 8 Jul 2001, at 22:32, Jordan Guthrie wrote:

> Grounded popped out of the ground right behind Lokk.  He sent a comm
> link.  "This is Grounded. Split the fork and choose a pea." he said
> hoping Lokk would understand his code.  He then went beside Lokk in
> his mole form walking slowly and stealthly behind him.  Using
> vibrations through the ground he determined within a few some odd
> yards they would be directly behind the enemy.
